name: Tag members in KlickTipp according to Schoolmaker course enrollment
description:
This automation connects SchoolMaker and KlickTipp to ensure your contact tagging always reflects the latest course enrollments.

Whenever a member enrolls in a new course in SchoolMaker, the scenario is triggered by a webhook that listens for completed enrollment steps. It captures key details — such as the member’s email, offer name, and offer ID — and routes the flow based on the enrolled course.

The router checks the offer name and applies the corresponding tags in KlickTipp.

With this setup, your KlickTipp contact database always mirrors your members’ active course enrollments, making it easy to:
Automate targeted follow-up sequences
Segment email campaigns dynamically
Keep CRM data synchronized across platforms

This template is ideal for educators, coaches, and course creators who use SchoolMaker to manage memberships and KlickTipp for email automation.
